content.description: Sit start on two side pulls. Climb up through pinches and slopers and then make a big move out left to get to the top out.
content.location: On the right side of the big scoop on the White Monster boulder. The trail continuing past the Governing Dynamics boulder will bring you here.

content.description: Sit/crouch start in front of the boulder on the left end of the White Monster block. Some people start matched on the low jug, others start with their left hand in a pod undercling and right hand either on the low jug or a small crimp. None of that matters or changes the grade at all. Navigate a tricky, beta-intensive, incredible sequence involving hand flips, recycled holds, and bicycles to a big right-hand toss to the diagonal jug rail in the center of the face. From here, trend left, passing a big lock-off and spicy deadpoint where the fall zone begins to get hairy. Traverse the lip left for the standard top-out or go direct for Greg Loomis' direct variation (V11). DO NOT FALL on this traverse or you will be traumatized...
content.protection: Lots of pads (8 or more is ideal), attentive spotters!
content.location: Located on the left side of the White Monster boulder in the North End sector.

content.description:
On the left end of the White Monster boulder.

Sit start with a sidepull and an undercling. Climb the arete and pull the precarious feeling topout.

Sit-start just left of White Monster on a left-facing flake feature. Work up into some sloping edges in the wide horizontal, and then make a big right-hand toss to the shelf. Maintain tension and blast out left to the jug mailslot of Earning Your Brunch (crux). Finish out EYB.
content.location: On the right side of the White Monster boulder between Earning Your Brunch and White Monster.

content.description: Start on obvious huge jugs, with feet on a big crystal patch. Head up and right, following a variety of features towards the peak of the boulder.
content.protection: A couple pads to cover rocks, and a spotter to keep them from sliding down the trail.
content.location: On the White Monster boulder, on the far right side. On the trail as you come to the boulder.

content.description: Long traverse line that links Earning Your Brunch into White Monster. This line flows so well and has some of the best moves on the wall. Â Guidebook gives V11 but consensus seems to be settling on mid-V10.
content.location: Starts on the center of the White Monster boulder on the same double underclings as Earning Your Brunch.

content.description: Sit start on the flat undercling in the dihedral. Make a big move the the slot up right and walk the feet around until you can reach the jug pinch loaf. Make a couple moves back left and topout on jugs directly above the start.
content.protection: Pads. Also tape your left pointer finger for the finger lock in the first slot.
content.location: On the White Monster boulder in the middle of the main overhanging face.
